message.content:
Ndifanele ndinikezele intloko yakho kwaye ndikhuthaze ngolwazi olukhawulezileyo. Nceda uxandulele ngemibuzo yakho, ndicinise ukuba ndikhumbulele ukunika amanqaku ngolwimi lwesiXhosa. 

1. Ukunceda abantu ukunceda ngendlela yokusebenza ngokusebenzisa iziyobisi:
 - Ngokuqhuba benxilile: 
   - Yenza isifundo sokuziphatha kwi-intanethi ukuze uzibandakanye nabantu abasebenzisa iziyobisi. 
   - Ziphatha ngokugqitywa ngokunye nokugqitha okusemantla. 
   - Cacisa ukuba ziziphi izinto ezinikezwe kwi-intanethi, njengemali, izigaba zokufunda, nokwazi.
   - Cacisa ukuba ziziphi izinto ezinikezwe kwi-email kwaye uze ukhuthaze abantu ukusebenzisa i-CC kwi-email.
   - Faka amanqaku okukhawulezileyo kwi-email ukuze ubone ukuba abantu bakwazi ukuyenza ukuze baziphathe ngendlela eyingozi.

2. Ukusebenzisa iziyobisi:
 - Cacisa ukuba abantu baziphathe ngendlela eyingozi ngenkxaso yokusebenzisa iziyobisi:
   - Faka umyalezo omkhawulezileyo kwi-iyuremende yokusebenzisa iziyobisi.
   - Cacisa ukuba ziziphi izinto ezinikezwe kwi-iziyobisi ezifana nokwenzeka ukuba zimthetho, iindidi, nokunye.
   - Hlaziya ukuba iziyobisi ziziphi izinto ezinikezwe ukuba ziyenzele izinto ngokwaneleyo, njengokuhlanganyela kwezifundo, ukuzibandakanya n
